mapper.insert: insert into cookpang.tbl_user (user_id, user_password, user_name, user_nickname, user_phone_number, user_email, user_address, user_self_introduction, user_gender) values(#{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userNickname}, #{userPhoneNumber}, #{userEmail}, #{userAddress}, #{userSelfIntroducation}, #{userGender})
